MessageContent: <StackPanel Name="panel" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:ui="http://schemas.lepo.co/wpfui/2022/xaml"><StackPanel Name="icon_content"><ui:SymbolIcon Symbol="MegaphoneLoud20" FontSize="100" /></StackPanel><TextBlock Text="Important Announcement!" FontWeight="SemiBold" FontSize="17" TextAlignment="Center" TextWrapping="WrapWithOverflow" Name="title" MaxWidth="450" Margin="0,20,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Visibility="Visible" /><TextBlock Text="MRA is being removed from Microsoft Store. You can read the full announcement from the link below." FontWeight="Normal" TextAlignment="Center" TextWrapping="WrapWithOverflow" Name="message" MaxWidth="470" Margin="0,10,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Visibility="Visible" /></StackPanel>

<StackPanel Name="panel" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:ui="http://schemas.lepo.co/wpfui/2022/xaml"><StackPanel Name="icon_content"><ui:SymbolIcon Symbol="MegaphoneLoud20" FontSize="100" /></StackPanel><TextBlock Text="New Supporter Feature Prices!" FontWeight="SemiBold" FontSize="17" TextAlignment="Center" TextWrapping="WrapWithOverflow" Name="title" MaxWidth="450" Margin="0,20,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Visibility="Visible" /><TextBlock Text="Exciting news! We've adjusted our Supporter Feature Prices to fit your needs better.

Explore our new rates: 
- Tier 1: $3
- Tier 2: $5
- Tier 3: $10

Visit our website for Patreon and BuyMeACoffee links." FontWeight="Normal" TextAlignment="Center" TextWrapping="WrapWithOverflow" Name="message" MaxWidth="470" Margin="0,10,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Visibility="Visible" /></StackPanel>
